sentences.en: After a whirlwind courtship, they married and went to live in Bath.
sentences.cn: 经过一场旋风式恋爱, 他们结了婚,到巴斯生活去了.

sentences.en: After a whirlwind romance the couple announced their engagement in July.
sentences.cn: 在闪电式的恋爱后，两人在7月宣布订婚。

sentences.en: And an angel still rides in the whirlwind and directs this storm.
sentences.cn: 这个故事必须延续下去.上帝会驾驭我们航行的.

sentences.en: He got married after a whirlwind romance.
sentences.cn: 在一场旋风式的恋爱后他很快就结婚了。

sentences.en: He reaped the whirlwind he had himself stirred up.
sentences.cn: 他自作自受,遭到了加倍的报应.

sentences.en: I fall and swept to safety a sudden whirlwind.
sentences.cn: 我跌落了并且被突如其来的微风安全的接住了.

sentences.en: If we'sow to the wind, we shall reap the whirlwind ".
sentences.cn: 如果我们 “ 风中播种, 将来必然收获旋风”( “ 现在做坏事,将来必收恶果”).

sentences.en: In doing so, you but sow the wind to reap the whirlwind.
sentences.cn: 这样做, 你只能得到更坏的结果.

sentences.en: In expansion games , Whirlwind is now properly modified by weapon speed.
sentences.cn: 资料版中旋风受武器速度影响!

sentences.en: In fact manufacturing also caught up in a global whirlwind.
sentences.cn: 事实上,制造业也卷入了全球的旋风.

sentences.en: Out of its chamber comes the whirlwind, And from scattering winds, cold.
sentences.cn: 9暴风出于南宫, 寒冷出于北风.

sentences.en: She was flung up into madness, as she rode the whirlwind.
sentences.cn: 在她最得意的时候, 她做出了疯狂的举动.

sentences.en: She was swept off her feet by a whirlwind courtship.
sentences.cn: 狂热的求爱使她控制不住自己的感情.

sentences.en: The school was seriously damaged by a whirlwind.
sentences.cn: 学校因旋风袭击而遭到严重破坏.

sentences.en: Then answered the LORD unto Job out of the whirlwind, and said.
sentences.cn: 于是,耶和华从旋风中回答约伯说.

words.tran_cn: [气象]旋风；旋风般的快速行动

phrases.phrase: (sow the wind and) reap the whirlwind

trans.tran_cn: 旋风般的，急速的，喧嚣混乱的
trans.tran_en: a whirlwind situation or event happens very quickly

trans.tran_cn: 旋风，猛烈的势力，混乱，破坏性的力量或事物
trans.tran_en: an extremely strong wind that moves quickly with a circular movement, causing a lot of damage
